definitions.definition: A red hard or gravel -like soil or subsoil formed in the tropics that has been leached of soluble minerals leaving insoluble iron and aluminium oxides and hydroxides ; used to make bricks and roads .

main_definition: A red hard or gravel -like soil or subsoil formed in the tropics that has been leached of soluble minerals leaving insoluble iron and aluminium oxides and hydroxides ; used to make bricks and roads .
